comments.body: Should this be `ExecutorInfo`, consistent with `TaskInfo` and `StageInfo`, etc?

comments.body: There's already an `ExecutorInfo` somewhere else. @ksakellis actually renamed this class to `ExecutorDetails` because of the naming conflict.
